summary: This mod changes the textures of the gods shrines.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the textures of the gods shrines.
It will affect the nine : Akatosh, Arkay, Dibella, Julianos, Kynareth, Mara, Stendarr, Talos and Zenithar.

Resolutions untouched from vanilla (512*512)

Mara > His shrine is now made of malachite
Stendarr > His shrine is now made of gold
Talos > Original texture reworked, sword is now silver
Zenithar > Original texture reworked
Kynareth > Original texture reworked
Julianos > His shrine is now made of obsidian
Arkay > His shrine is now made of gold and ruby
Dibella > Original texture reworked, there is also more gold on the ribs
Akatosh > His shrine is now made of blue marble

Hope you enjoy!

My others mods :
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5436]Variety Soul Gems[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5491]Variety Enchant Effect[/url]

If you like it, please endorse :p

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install : Copy the \"textures\" folder from the archive to your Skyrim data folder (located in C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data on 64bits systems and C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data on 32bits systems)

Uninstall : Simply delete the \"shrines\" folder from data/textures/clutter
author: Doorn
